org.dbasu.robomvvm.viewmodel

Class BaseViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dbasu.robomvvm.componentmodel.Component
      • org.dbasu.robomvvm.viewmodel.BaseViewModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MenuViewModel, ViewModel

    public abstract class BaseViewModel
extends Component
    Abstract base class for view models. All view models are associated with a context and must contain a SetLayout annotation specifying the resource id to use for its layout.

    • Field Summary

        public Context getContext()
        Get the associated context.

      • getLayoutId

        public int getLayoutId()
        Get the layout resource id associated with this view model. The id is set using the SetLayout annotation.
        Returns:
        The associated resource Id.

      • bind

        protected void bind()
        Override this in subclasses to set up the bindings between the view model and its layout.

      • bindProperty

        protected abstract Binding bindProperty(java.lang.String property,
                   int elementId,
                   java.lang.String elementProperty,
                   ValueConverter valueConverter,
                   BindMode bindMode)
        Bind a property of this view model to a property of an element in its layout.
        Parameters:
        property - The property of the view model
        elementId - The id of the target element.
        elementProperty - The property of the target element.
        valueConverter - The value converter to use for conversion.
        bindMode - The bind mode to use.
        Returns:
        The created binding.

      • bindAction

        protected abstract Binding bindAction(int elementId,
                 java.lang.Class<? extends EventArg> eventType,
                 java.lang.String action)
        Binds an event of this view model to an action of an element in its layout.
        Parameters:
        elementId - The id of the target element.
        eventType - The event arg class to bind.
        action - The action of the target element.
        Returns:
        The created binding.

      • bindProperty

        protected final Binding bindProperty(java.lang.String property,
                   int elementId,
                   java.lang.String elementProperty)
        Bind a property of this view model to a property of an element in its layout. Performs no conversion. Uses BindMode.SOURCE_TO_TARGET which results in one-way binding from this view model to the target element.
        Parameters:
        property - The property of the view model
        elementId - The id of the target element.
        elementProperty - The property of the target element.
        Returns:
        The created binding.

      • bindProperty

        protected final Binding bindProperty(java.lang.String property,
                   int elementId,
                   java.lang.String elementProperty,
                   BindMode bindMode)
        Bind a property of this view model to a property of an element in its layout. Performs no conversion.
        Parameters:
        property - The property of the view model
        elementId - The id of the target element.
        elementProperty - The property of the target element.
        bindMode - The bind mode to use.
        Returns:
        The created binding.
